scripts.fixed-load: artillery run -e fixed-load z_uat-load-test.yml -o ./reports/uat-load-test-fixed.json && artillery report ./reports/uat-load-test-fixed.json --output ./reports/uat-load-test-fixed.html
scripts.low-load: artillery run -e low-load z_uat-load-test.yml -o ./reports/uat-load-test-low.json && artillery report ./reports/uat-load-test-low.json --output ./reports/uat-load-test-low.html
scripts.max-load: artillery run -e max-load z_uat-load-test.yml -o ./reports/uat-load-test-max.json && artillery report ./reports/uat-load-test-max.json --output ./reports/uat-load-test-max.html
